parameters.name: UniqueName
parameters.description: Unique ID of this user notification

title: ISldWorks.DefineUserNotification
description: Called by a SOLIDWORKS add-in, creates a user notification definition object.

parameters.name: UniqueName
parameters.description: Unique ID of this user notification

remarks:
It is the add-in's responsibility to ensure that the ID is unique by using, for example, a combination of add-in module name and unique notification identifier:
"MyAddInName+ID_MYNOTIFICATION1"
